operator.op: tms.xtmst_loadorder ld.xtmst_loadorder_id='%{xtmst_loadorder_vLst[xtmst_loadorder_id]}' UPDATE tms.xtmst_loadorder ld JOIN tms.xtmst_loadorderdetail ldd ON ld.LoadOrderID=ldd.LoadOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_dispatchplan dp ON ld.VehicleRealTimeID=dp.VehicleRealTimeID AND dp.FreightID=ldd.FreightID JOIN tms.xtmst_freight f ON f.FreightID=dp.FreightID left JOIN tms.xtmst_pickuporder pk ON f.PickupOrderID=pk.PickupOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_vehiclesituation vs ON vs.VehicleRealTimeID=ld.VehicleRealTimeID AND vs.CityID=ld.LoadCityID AND vs.Address=ld.LoadAddress JOIN tms.xtmst_vehiclerealtime vrt ON ld.VehicleRealTimeID=vrt.VehicleRealTimeID SET ld.Status=603,dp.Status=302,f.STATUS=if(f.ConsignmentMode=1001,if(f.DeliveryMethod=1213 or f.DeliveryMethod=1214,206,if(f.FromXSiteID=dp.FromXSiteID,207,if(dp.ToXSiteID is null ,211,212))),if(f.ConsignmentMode=1002,205,206)),pk.OrderSTATUS=106 WHERE %{WHERE}; set @vrtid=null;select VehicleRealTimeID into @vrtid from %{table} ld where %{where}; update tms.xtmst_vehiclerealtime vrt JOIN tms.xtmst_freight f ON vrt.VehicleRealTimeID=f.VehicleRealTimeID AND f.status=205 SET vrt.Status=403 WHERE vrt.VehicleRealTimeID=@vrtid and (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM tms.xtmst_freight WHERE VehicleRealTimeID=@vrtid AND STATUS!=205)=0;

DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_loadorder ld left join tms.xtmst_loadorderdetail ldd ON ld.LoadOrderID=ldd.LoadOrderID
